Package planetarium.solarsystem

Class CelestialBody

java.lang.Object
planetarium.solarsystem.CelestialBody
Direct Known Subclasses:
Moon, Planet, Star
public abstract class CelestialBody extends Object
Represent a celestial body, an object in the universe with an identifier, a position and a mass.

  • Constructor Details

    • CelestialBody

      public CelestialBody(Position position, long mass, String identifier)
      Constructor for a generic celestial body.
      Parameters:
      position - the celestial body's position relative to his parent.
      mass - the celestial body's mass.
      identifier - the unique identifier for the celestial body.

    • CelestialBody

      public CelestialBody(double x, double y, long mass, String identifier)
      Constructor for a generic celestial body.
      Parameters:
      x - the celestial body's offset along the x-axis relative to his parent.
      y - the celestial body's offset along the y-axis relative to his parent.
      mass - the celestial body's mass.
      identifier - the unique identifier for the celestial body.

  • Method Details

    • getRelativePosition

      public Position getRelativePosition()
      Getter method for the position of the celestial body relative to his parent.
      Returns:
      the relative position of the celestial body.

    • getPosition

      public abstract Position getPosition()
      Getter method for the absolute position. Gets position relative to an arbitrary origin , has to be implemented by every subclass.
      Returns:
      absolute position of the celestial body.
      See Also:
      • Position

    • getMass

      public long getMass()
      Getter method for the mass.
      Returns:
      the celestial body's mass.

      the celestial body's unique identifier.
